snippet: An attack by militants on a security checkpoint in Jamrud killed eight soldiers. Four of the militants also died.
abstract: Attack by militants on security checkpoint in northwestern Pakistan kills eight soldiers; assault takes place in Jamrud, main town in Khyber tribal region.
lead_paragraph: An attack by militants on a security checkpoint in Jamrud killed eight soldiers. Four of the militants also died.

headline.main: Pakistan: More Attacks on Soldiers and the Police in Tribal Regions
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: More Attacks on Soldiers and the Police in Tribal Regions
